content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 2, West Ham United 1.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 2, West Ham United 1.

Goal!  Chelsea 2, West Ham United 1. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Michy Batshuayi with a headed pass.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
